name: Bit (tugames)
description:
Bit (pronounced bi:t) is a smartphone based music puzzle, where the goal is to make electronic music by "firing" beats at the right time. The player must figure out which objects to hit, and when to hit them in order to win the game and make music.

The game doesn't run well in browser, as the beats don't sync as they should. Scramble your 'droids! ;—)
